name: The Genius Magician who Sees the Rainbow
author: Sewer
content: In the slums lived a young boy named Ray who lacked emotions.He suddenly gained the ability to see &quotcolors&quot that no one else could, and he had the power to control them.One day, he lost his shelter, an underpass, and his friends to a magician. He even lost Niles, whom he had believed in and followed.The emotionless boy swore to take revenge, beginning his search to regain his emotions.
